value:
I am told that this attire is fitting. How
little protection it affords in battle!
I am confident in my skill, but still...

Picture him, on a visit to the sea...
Trying to wrest a shark from the
water using only his bare hands...$k$pKnowing Ephraim, he could actually
manage the feat.

Does your country border the ocean,
$Nu?
Frelia's seas are a sight to behold.

You'd don a swimsuit? To what end?
Do you mean to challenge me in the
water? I'd think again, were I you...$k$pI am as talented a swimmer as I am
an archer.

It's important to stretch before
swimming. Preparation is essential
for any situation. Heed my words!$k$pNow, let's see how flexible you are.

I bear greetings and an array of
tropical fruit as a symbol of friendship,
all from $Nf.

No matter how I am attired, I
am without flaw.

I'm getting used to all of this, it
seems.

Absurd. This does not happen to
me.

Very well. I will strive to flourish
under your leadership.

Please excuse my casual dress... I
am Innes, prince of Frelia.$k$pYou'll have to allow me to make an
official introduction at another time...
When I am attired appropriately.

Approaching from this angle won't
lead to a clean split. But if I were to
change my tactics, what then?$k$pDon't just stand there gawping. Did
you have need of my counsel,
$Nu?$k$pNo? Well, then. I imagine this mound
of melons has already led you to
deduce my intentions...but I'll explain.$k$pI'm practicing splitting watermelons.
This is a folk custom from some realm
or other... A summertime contest.$k$pWhoever can split a watermelon most
powerfully and cleanly while
blindfolded is judged victorious.$k$pEven if it's a silly custom, my pride
won't allow for any less than top
performance.$k$pThere is always a chance that, some
day, I may face Ephraim in this trial!
I must be prepared!$k$pJoin me! Grip the stick, and strike at
the melon as at the heart of your rival!
せやっ！
見よ！
うああっ！
しまった…
Behold my breaststroke!
I'm quite serious, you know.
You let your guard down.
You cannot help but look!
Stepped on a jellyfish…
Hmph.
I will be king of Frelia one day. Don't even think of underestimating me simply because I'm dressed for leisure.
Well done! You snuck right up on me.
I certainly don't have time to waste splashing around in the water like... Like some do.
So what if it's just a trip to the beach? Even if I'm swimming, my form must be without flaw.
I can't waste this opportunity. I'll learn all there is to learn about the sea...
There is one man I could never stand to lose a swimming contest to. Ephraim.
I don't know quite what it is about you. I find your companionship...favorable.
Just so.
A king's duty.
Get ready to swim.
